name: Crate Stacker 📦
description:
View at ldjam.com

  • 🎮 Supported
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
  • X - Pick Up / Drop Crate
  • Y - Raise / Lower Crate
  • Crates that are ready to be picked up become purple.
  • Crates that are picked up become green.
  • Crates can be raised and lowered.
  • Stacks of crates cannot be carried.
  • The direction cannot be flipped while carrying a crate.
  • If blocked, holding down the movement button before dropping it will throw the crate.
